response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both you and us. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We believe this price is highly favorable and would greatly appreciate your consideration. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 7200}
